message.body: I'm in, also probably Christian
Can I get a ride to lordan's?
Are there any other swarthmoreans going? I can get you if not, I just got to christians
I have no idea
I don't think so? I'll ask kit
We're coming to pick you up girl
Kit says he's not going right now.
Wow never say that again
Christian?
We'll be there
Here.
I would like to publicly declare that kit has lost all claim to the SSC, having not gone to work in so long that he forgot about the staff appreciation party
Maybe late, I need to at least show up to aforementioned staff party
Kit I think it starts before then, also ew.
#got'em
Ha the Easter bunny hills. You haven't seen the things I've seen. The salty canyon changes a man. His soul never quite recovers...
I know I haven't said much about candy crush, but for the past three days I have been battling to get 100000 points in 25 moves...
Hey mostly everyone: are we doing anything to send off Nico? Maybe a surprise party or a real party or just hanging out?
Tomorrow
When the rest of the group wakes up we can decide. Is anyone good at planning surprise parties?
When does your meet end?
My house is free tonight
Who is in charge? Kylie?
Yes. Also those attending should bring some cash to cover these costs and senior week foodstuffs

So due to the fact that Nico already asked me to hang out later people will have to set up without me. Just come in through the side porch door and set up in the living room, I will take Nico through the same door
4:20 I'll bring him at like 4:35?
Vanilla!
Vanilla
Everyone wants vanilla! Chocolate store bought sheet cakes taste like oil, cacao, and shit
Sorry to the chocolate fans. Lets be honest I'm just venting candy crush frustrations
I would also like to vote vanilla
I will bring him in ten
Be there in 4 watch the driveway
Probably
